snippet: In granting an injunction, Chancellor Leo E. Strine Jr. of the Delaware Chancery Court found that Martin Marietta Materials had breached confidentiality agreements between the two companies
abstract: In granting an injunction, Chancellor Leo E. Strine Jr. of the Delaware Chancery Court found that Martin Marietta Materials had breached confidentiality agreements between the two companies

headline.main: Judge Halts Martin Marietta Bid for Vulcan Materials
